title: ReactJS Developer
description:
Qcentrio is now hiring ReactJS Developer in Austin, TX. View job listing details
and apply now. Role React JS Developer Location Hoffman Estates IL OR Austin TX
OR San Jose CA Initial Remote Long Term Roles amp Responsibilities Up-to-date
knowledge of Microsoft products Experience with Javascript ES6 ES7 frameworks
and libraries such as Reactjs Redux Vue and its ecosystem Deep understanding of
html semantics CSS sass less box-model flexbox Following and understanding
front-end good practices Willingness to learn and staying up to date with latest
trends Practical knowledge about different testing approaches and tools Unit
testing e2e testing BDD TDD Ability to communicate information to technical and
non-technical stakeholders Ability to gain an understanding of customer process
and issues and communicate them back If you are interested Share updated resume
at shivabqcentriocom ASAP
